mapper.insert: insert into cpm_building_unit_estate( building_unit_id, room_number, status, type, construction_area, indoor_area, create_id, create_date, is_delete, device_number )values ( #{buildingUnitId}, #{roomNumber}, #{status}, #{type}, #{constructionArea}, #{indoorArea}, #{createId}, #{createDate}, #{isDelete}, #{deviceNumber} )
insert into sys_service_browsing( name, content, create_id, create_date )values ( #{name}, #{content}, #{createId}, #{createDate} )
